fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Each night, you must choose a player and one of the following: First Letter, Alignment, Subalignment, Attack, Defense, Lowest Prime Factor.
-Each night, you must choose a role that aligns with none of the characteristics you've found that you have not chosen yet. You become that role, with these two attributes still in play. This role cancels out any conversion protection.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win as your chosen role, or get to a point where there are no other possible roles for you to choose.
